cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.18.1)
project(panther_jni)

add_library(panther_jni SHARED panther_jni.c)

# Path to prebuilt Rust shared library (copied via cargo-ndk into jniLibs)
add_library(panther_ffi SHARED IMPORTED)
set_target_properties(panther_ffi PROPERTIES IMPORTED_LOCATION
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/../jniLibs/${ANDROID_ABI}/libpanther_ffi.so)

# Include header generated by cbindgen
include_directories(${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/../../../../../bindings/include)

target_link_libraries(panther_jni panther_ffi log)
